title: Effect of Topical Application of Sulforaphane- Containing Broccoli Sprout Extracts on Radiation Dermatitis During External-beam Radiation Therapy for Breast Cancer

operands.value: Must have pathologically confirmed invasive adenocarcinoma or ductal carcinoma in situ of the breast
Patients must have undergone segmental mastectomy (i.e., lumpectomy)
Patients must not have received prior radiation therapy to the breast
Patients must not have active local-regional disease prior to registration
Women of child-bearing age will be given a serum pregnancy test prior to study entry to ensure they are not pregnant
Women of child-bearing age will be counseled on the importance of avoiding pregnancy and hormonal contraception while undergoing radiation therapy
Patients must not have a serious medical or psychiatric illness which prevents informed consent or compliance with treatment
All patients must be informed of the investigational nature of this study and give written informed consent in accordance with institutional and federal guidelines
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Visible skin pathology, excessive freckles, or skin blemishes in the test area
History of skin disease or hypersensitivity and repeated contact allergies

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('All patients must be informed of the investigational nature of this study and give written informed consent in accordance with institutional and federal guidelines'), Symbol('Must be FEMALE'), Symbol('Must have minimum age of 18 Years'), Symbol('Must have pathologically confirmed invasive adenocarcinoma or ductal carcinoma in situ of the breast'), Symbol('Patients must have undergone segmental mastectomy (i.e., lumpectomy)'), Symbol('Patients must not be pregnant'), Symbol('Patients must not have a serious medical or psychiatric illness which prevents informed consent or compliance with treatment'), Symbol('Patients must not have active local-regional disease prior to registration'), Symbol('Patients must not have received prior radiation therapy to the breast'), Symbol('Women of child-bearing age will be counseled on the importance of avoiding pregnancy and hormonal contraception while undergoing radiation therapy'), Symbol('Women of child-bearing age will be given a serum pregnancy test prior to study entry to ensure they are not pregnant'), Not(Or(Symbol('Current tobacco use'), Symbol('History of skin disease or hypersensitivity and repeated contact allergies'), Symbol('Metastatic disease to the breast'), Symbol('Sarcoma or squamous cell histology'), Symbol('Visible skin pathology, excessive freckles, or skin blemishes in the test area'))))
